DOC.brief_summary: The study aim investigate role dietary factor chronically stressed subject . Previous study show milk protein , B vitamins probiotic may influence subjective well-being stressed subject .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Dietary Factors Physiological Subjective Stress Responses
DOC.criteria: STAI point 4065 BMI 1830 kg/m2 healthy Gastrointestinal disease , diabetes significant major medical morbidity milk allergy smoke excess use alcohol pregnancy breast feed waist circumference male > 102 cm , females > 88 cm medication dietary supplement influence measured response
